comment: Dr. Brosnan's testquizzes were fairly difficult. Lectures do not go along with graded assignments. Multiple short papers, easy to write on but his grading is picky about certain things. Also have a research paper that is awful. His whole focus is on Corporate Social Responsibility.
Everything he lectures about isn't even on his test. You have to know specific things from the reading in the book. I don't like him as a teacher, it's boring and awkward. Don't take his class.
